news.headline: Global adhesive dispensing equipment market is projected to reach $19.6 billion by 2033 with a 5.3% CAGR growth driven by automation, eco-friendly adhesives and technological advancements.
news.summary: The global adhesive dispensing equipment market was valued at $11.6 billion in 2023 and is projected to reach $19.6 billion by 2033, growing at a CAGR of 5.3%. The growth is primarily driven by automation and manufacturing efficiency advancements across industries like automotive, electronics, packaging, and construction. The demand for lightweight materials in automotive and aerospace sectors fuels the need for high-performance adhesives. Additionally, the shift towards eco-friendly adhesives and technological advancements, such as smart dispensing systems, are further driving market growth. The report covers various segments like mounting type, power source, adhesive type, component type, end-user, and region.

news.headline: Infineon Technologies (OTC:IFNNY) surpasses Q1 estimated earnings by 30%, reporting a strong EPS.
news.summary: On February 4, 2025, Infineon Technologies (OTC: IFNNY) unveiled its Q1 earnings report at 05:00 AM. The company exceeded anticipated earnings by 30.0%, revealing an EPS of [number]. For more details, the complete article can be accessed on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Global Truck-Mounted Crane market valued at $2.5 billion in 2024, set to reach $4.5 billion by 2035 with a 5.5% CAGR. Technological advancements driving growth in the industry, enhancing lifting capacity, control, safety, and efficiency. Key players include SANY GROUP, Terex Corporation, Liebherr-International Deutschland GmbH. Major users include construction, logistics, and utility maintenance sectors. Key focus on product development and strategic partnerships to enhance offerings and market position.
news.summary: The global Truck Mounted Crane market was valued at around US$2.5 billion in 2024, expected to reach US$4.5 billion by 2035 with a 5.5% CAGR. Technological advancements like improved hydraulic systems, control systems, lightweight materials, and engine technologies have enhanced crane efficiency and capabilities, expanding their applications across industries. Key players driving innovation include Sany Group, Terex Corporation, Liebherr-International Deutschland GmbH, among others. Primary users are construction companies, logistics providers, and utility maintenance firms, seeking high lifting capacity, mobility, and reliability. Key developments also include partnerships, technological advancements, and improved stability by companies like KATO WORKS CO., LTD. and Sany Group.

news.headline: China's top negotiator resists Trump's pressure in trade war. Total tariff imposition stands at $250 billion.
Palantir's Q4 revenue beats estimates at $827.52 million, EPS at 14 cents. Total revenue grew 36% YoY with strong U.S. growth.
news.summary: Palantir Technologies Inc (NASDAQ: PLTR) saw its shares rise as the company announced strong financial performance for the fourth quarter. The Q4 revenue stood at $827.52 million, surpassing estimates of $775.91 million. Earnings per share (EPS) for Q4 were reported at 14 cents, beating the estimated 11 cents.Total revenue showed a 36% year-over-year increase, mainly driven by a robust 52% growth in U.S. revenue. U.S. Commercial revenue surged by 64% year-over-year to $214 million, while U.S. Government revenue rose by 45% year-over-year to $343 million. Palantir witnessed a 43% year-over-year growth in the customer count, with a 13% quarter-over-quarter increase.During the quarter, Palantir closed 129 deals valued over $1 million and 58 deals worth at least $5 million. The company generated $460 million in cash from operations and $517 million in adjusted free cash flow in Q4. The quarter ended strong with positive outlook as several analysts raised their price targets post the financial report.

news.headline: Spotify's Q4 revenue beats expectations with $4.53 billion, 16% increase YoY. Earnings $1.88/share misses estimates, stock gains.
news.summary: Shares of Spotify Technology (NYSE: SPOT) rose following the release of its fiscal fourth-quarter 2024 financial results, which exceeded expectations. The company reported earnings of $1.88 per share, falling short of the estimated $2.06. However, quarterly sales reached $4.53 billion (4.24 billion euros), demonstrating a 16% increase from the previous year and surpassing the anticipated $4.15 billion. Additionally, Spotify saw a net addition of 35 million monthly average users (MAU) quarter-over-quarter, surpassing forecasts by ten million. For more on this story, visit Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Trump to host dinner with Republican senators on Friday - ABC.
Sports Business Ventures teams up with Careers Launch Talent Group to revolutionize sports industry recruitment.
news.summary: In Mesa, Arizona on February 4, 2025, Sports Business Ventures (SBV) has announced a strategic partnership with Careers Launch Talent Group. SBV is a comprehensive sports brand specializing in media, community, and consulting services. Meanwhile, Careers Launch Talent Group is a renowned global company that excels in executive recruitment and outplacement services. This collaboration aims to leverage each other's strengths and expertise in the sports industry.

news.headline: Corporate philanthropy leaders changing priorities due to policy changes. Survey by The Conference Board reveals shifts for the year ahead.
news.summary: In New York on February 4, 2025, significant changes in US policy have led corporate philanthropy leaders to rethink their companies' philanthropic priorities for the upcoming year. A recent survey by The Conference Board indicates that a growing number of corporate philanthropy executives are adjusting their strategies in response to these shifts.

news.headline: Ounce of Hope introduces first THC-infused King Cake for Mardi Gras. Louisiana tradition meets cannabis industry.
news.summary: In Memphis, Tennessee on February 4, 2025, Ounce of Hope, a prominent cannabis company, has introduced a unique product to the market. They are launching the inaugural THC-infused King Cake, which is a seasonal offering inspired by the flavors of Louisiana. This limited-edition treat aims to merge the cannabis industry with the rich culinary tradition of Louisiana.

news.headline: Susan Muigai appointed as Chief People Officer at Mastercard from April 7, 2025. Michael Fraccaro to serve as advisor till 2025.
news.summary: Susan Muigai is set to assume the role of Chief People Officer at Mastercard starting April 7, 2025. Additionally, Michael Fraccaro will continue to support the company as an advisor through the year 2025.

news.headline: AgriFORCE Growing Systems Ltd. has seen exponential growth in a 75-day period, going into bitcoin mining and agtech, setting industry benchmarks.
news.summary: In Vancouver, British Columbia, on February 4, 2025, AgriFORCE Growing Systems Ltd. (NASDAQ: AGRI) announced significant advancements in their operations. Over the span of 75 days, the company has successfully transitioned into a dual-functioning entity, now operating as a bitcoin mining and agtech company. This strategic shift has resulted in diversified revenue streams for the company, propelling it to the forefront of innovation and growth in Canada and the United States. The transformation marks a notable achievement for AgriFORCE, setting industry standards with their rapid evolution.

news.headline: Carccu® launches boho-inspired flower wrapping paper trends for 2025, offering 10 new prints annually.
news.summary: Carccu®, a prominent packaging manufacturer based in Finland, is staying ahead of the curve in the evolving floral industry. The company is setting new standards with its wide array of flower wrapping paper. Situated in Sastamala, Finland, as of February 4, 2025, they unveil an extensive collection boasting two annual releases, adding 10 fresh prints to their repertoire each year.

news.headline: Ambassadors and consuls praise UAE SWAT Challenge 2025 in Dubai, uniting global participants.
news.summary: Ambassadors and consuls from multiple countries in the UAE commended the initiative behind the sixth edition of the UAE SWAT Challenge 2025 held at the training city in Al Ruwayyah. The event, which took place on February 4, 2025, garnered praise for its efforts to promote cooperation and skills in the field of tactical operations. The diplomats highlighted the importance of such challenges in fostering collaboration and enhancing preparedness in dealing with security threats. The event saw participation from a diverse range of countries, underscoring its significance in promoting international cooperation.

news.headline: Perfect Game announces 2025 Select Festivals, showcase for top youth talent in baseball/softball; annual marquee events.
news.summary: A major youth baseball and softball platform and scouting service, Perfect Game, has unveiled the schedule and venues for the 2025 Select Festivals. These prominent events will feature the best young baseball talent from around the globe, offering a platform for showcasing skills and connecting with scouts. The festivals serve as a significant opportunity for young players to demonstrate their abilities and potentially secure future prospects in the sport.

news.headline: Vestar ends 35th year with impressive growth, developing 2M sq ft of retail space in 2024. #Vestar #retail #growth
news.summary: In 2024, Vestar, a prominent privately owned shopping center owner and operator in the United States, experienced substantial expansion. They developed over two million square feet of retail space and welcomed several new additions to their portfolio.

news.headline: TED is seeking a new steward to lead the brand forward, calling on the global community for support.
news.summary: A nonprofit organization based in New York has made an official announcement on Feb. 4, 2025, stating that TED, known for its dedication to uncovering and sharing innovative ideas, is seeking assistance from its worldwide community to select its next leader.

news.headline: Nextep wins 2025 Best of HR Services Award for exceptional service, recognized as industry leader by ClearlyRated.
news.summary: Today, in Norman, Oklahoma, on February 4, 2025, Nextep, a top HR services company, was revealed as the recipient of the esteemed Best of HR Services Award. This award recognizes their outstanding service provided to clients. The award, given by ClearlyRated, distinguishes Nextep as a top performer in the industry, setting them apart as an exemplary provider of human resources services.

news.headline: Terra Origin and Meghan Trainor collaborate to introduce Healthy Hydration+ and Healthy Greens products for wellness.
news.summary: Terra Origin, a leading brand in dietary supplements, unveiled its latest offerings in New York on February 4, 2025. The new product line includes Healthy Hydration+ and Healthy Greens, both aimed at providing a natural and healthy boost. These supplements are designed to harness clean energy and optimal nutrients, catering to the increasing demand for wellness products. This strategic product launch showcases Terra Origin's commitment to innovation and consumer health.

news.headline: Four new members appointed to 2025 AESC Board of Directors in global leadership consultancy.
news.summary: The Association of Executive Search and Leadership Consultants, a global organization for firms placing and advising global leaders, has announced the appointment of new board directors and officers. The additions to the board bring fresh perspectives to the association, enhancing its leadership team. The announcement was made in New York on Feb. 4, 2025. This move reinforces the association's commitment to staying at the forefront of the industry, with the new members bringing diverse expertise and experience to the table.

news.headline: GATC Health's stem cell therapy to revolutionize diabetes care, personalized treatment option for patients. IRVINE, Calif., Feb. 4, 2025.
news.summary: A groundbreaking method has been developed to provide a customized and efficient treatment solution for individuals battling diabetes and possibly other illnesses. Based in Irvine, California, GATC Health Corp, a prominent tech-bio organization, is utilizing artificial intelligence (AI) to revolutionize the healthcare sector. The innovative approach aims to cater to patients' specific needs and could significantly enhance treatment outcomes. This development was announced on February 4, 2025.

news.headline: Assisted Living Locators celebrates National Senior Independence Month, empowering older adults with services for independence.
news.summary: In Scottsdale, Arizona, on February 4, 2025, it was announced that National Senior Independence Month is being celebrated this month to honor the freedom and autonomy of older adults. Assisted Living Locators, a prominent national provider of senior care guidance, is highlighting its range of services aimed at empowering seniors.

news.headline: U.S. farmers positive for 2025 with Ag Economy Barometer rising to 141 in January, up by 5 points from December.
news.summary: In West Lafayette, Indiana, on February 4, 2025, American farmers started the year with positivity, with the January Purdue University/CME Group Ag Economy Barometer increasing by 5 points to reach a reading of 141 compared to the previous month. This rise was fueled by a notable 9-point increase in the Current Index, indicating a growing optimism among agricultural producers.

news.headline: West Monroe introduces Intellio® Hopper, boosts data teams by 80%. Tool to quicken adoption of AI.
news.summary: A leading global business and technology consulting firm, West Monroe, has introduced its latest asset - the Agentic AI Workflow solution, Intellio® Hopper, aimed at transforming the way companies implement AI. This groundbreaking tool was launched in Chicago on February 4, 2025. West Monroe's innovation is set to revolutionize operations for businesses looking to modernize, providing them with state-of-the-art AI capabilities.

news.headline: Table Trac, Inc. partners with Apache Nugget Corporation to provide CasinoTrac CMS and SlotSUITE to all resorts and casinos. Reopening on February 14 in Cuba, N.M.
news.summary: Today, in Minnetonka, Minnesota, Table Trac, Inc. revealed that it has secured a deal to provide its CasinoTrac casino management system and the SlotSUITE bonusing suite to the Apache Nugget Corporation, a business entity of the Jicarilla Apache Nation. The technology will be integrated into all casino and resort operations of Apache Nugget, beginning with the reopening of its casino near Cuba, New Mexico on February 14th. Table Trac, Inc. (OTCQX: TBTC) is facilitating this venture, marking a significant milestone for both companies.

news.headline: Dassault Systemes (DASTY) beats Q4 estimated earnings by 19%, reports EPS of $0.43 vs estimate $0.36, revenue up $111M.
news.summary: Dassault Systemes (OTC:DASTY) released its Q4 earnings report on February 4, 2025, at 06:30 AM. In a positive turn, the company outperformed expected earnings by 19.0%, with an EPS of $0.43 compared to the estimated $0.36. Revenue also showed growth, increasing by $111.00 million compared to the previous year. For more details, the complete story can be found on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: LTC Properties Inc. (NYSE: LTC) will release Q4 earnings on Feb. 24, 2025 after market close. Conference call on Feb. 25 at 8:00am Pacific/11:00am Eastern.
news.summary: LTC Properties Inc. (NYSE: LTC) will be announcing its fourth quarter earnings on Monday, February 24, 2025, after the market closes. A conference call will be held on Tuesday, February 25, 2025, at 8:00 a.m. Pacific / 11:00 a.m. Eastern, to discuss the performance and operating results for the quarter that concluded on December 31, 2024. Interested individuals can join the live conference call through a webcast.

news.headline: Diageo suspends medium-term guidance as Trump's tariff looms. FY25 first-half earnings reveal $10.9B net sales, 1% organic growth. Operating profit drops by 4.9%. Maintains/grows market share in 65% of total net sales.
news.summary: Beverage company Diageo Plc (NYSE:DEO) has released its first-half FY25 earnings, halting medium-term guidance. The company disclosed net sales of $10.9 billion for the six months ended December 2024, marking a slight 0.6% drop mainly due to adverse foreign exchange rates. Organic net sales, however, saw a 1.0% increase, supported by favorable price/mix adjustments, despite a mild 0.2% volume decline. Operating profit also fell by 4.9%, leading to a 132 basis point decrease in operating profit margin, influenced by currency fluctuations and decreased organic operating margins. Nevertheless, despite these challenges, Diageo managed to either sustain or expand market share in 65% of total net sales value in monitored markets, including the U.S.

news.headline: BostonGene collaborates on a white paper with FoCR to enhance companion diagnostic tests for rare biomarkers, providing strategic recommendations.
news.summary: A company based in Waltham, Massachusetts, BostonGene, specializing in AI-driven molecular and immune profiling solutions, has collaborated with Friends of Cancer Research to produce a white paper called “Innovative Validation and Regulatory Processes for Companion Diagnostic Tests for Rare Biomarkers or Indications.” This paper addresses crucial aspects and offers strategic suggestions aimed at enhancing the creation of companion diagnostic tests for rare biomarkers and conditions. The collaborative effort emphasizes the significance of effective regulatory processes in this particular niche.

news.headline: Bloomberg Surveillance TV on February 4, 2025, covers the latest financial news.
ADM to slash jobs due to third annual profit decline.
Investors rush to Turkey amid inflation concerns; seeking assurance, pledges.
ATIF Holdings Ltd. secures $2.5M through registered direct offering and private placement with institutional investor.
news.summary: Lake Forest, California-based ATIF Holdings Limited (Nasdaq: ZBAI) revealed today that it has finalized deals with an institutional investor for the acquisition and trade of its ordinary shares and pre-funded warrants in a registered direct offering. The company, which specializes in providing IPO, M&A advisory, and post-IPO compliance services to small and medium-sized businesses looking to go public in the US, will also sell warrants to purchase ordinary shares in a separate private placement. The combined transactions are anticipated to bring in total gross proceeds of roughly $2.5 million.

news.headline: Investment firm assembles wealth management team, recruits professionals from First Republic.
Vega Stella appoints Al Hansen as Senior Managing Director to lead healthcare strategy. Effective Feb 10, 2025. #Healthcare #VegaStella
news.summary: Today, Vega Stella revealed the selection of Al Hansen as the Senior Managing Director, commencing his role on February 10, 2025. Mr. Hansen will be responsible for advancing the firm's healthcare strategy, with a particular emphasis on enhancing knowledge in critical healthcare sectors.

news.headline: Jupiter Neurosciences (NASDAQ: JUNS) addresses market volatility, focusing on advancing clinical trials, plans DTC launch generating revenue.
news.summary: On February 4, 2025, in Jupiter, Florida, Jupiter Neurosciences, Inc. (NASDAQ: JUNS), a clinical-stage pharmaceutical company, announced plans for the launch of its patented resveratrol-based platform, JOTROL™. Amidst market volatility, the company aims to introduce a Direct-to-Consumer product towards the end of the year. This move is anticipated to bring in immediate revenues as Jupiter progresses in its clinical trials.

news.headline: VDURA debuts new data platform at Rice University's Energy HPC Conference, Feb 25-27, 2025. Leading AI and HPC solutions provider in energy sector.
news.summary: VDURA, a prominent company specializing in AI and HPC data infrastructure solutions, is set to showcase its latest data platform at the upcoming 18th annual Energy HPC Conference at Rice University's Ken Kennedy Institute from February 25 to 27, 2025. With a strong reputation in the energy industry, VDURA aims to drive advancements in energy innovation by offering rapid data processing, top-notch data durability, and cutting-edge technology. This event will bring together industry experts and innovators to discuss the latest trends in high-performance computing for the energy sector.

news.headline: Industry veteran Robert McCord joins Agile Defense board to boost cybersecurity solutions for DoD and federal clients.
news.summary: Agile Defense, a prominent company specializing in digital transformation, data analytics, and cybersecurity services for the Department of Defense and federal civilian sectors, revealed on Feb. 4, 2025, that Robert (Bob) McCord has been welcomed as a new addition to the team. This move highlights the company's commitment to expanding its expertise in the industry.

news.headline: Indian Electricity Industry report for 2024-2035 highlights increased RE, Corporate PPAs, M&A Investments, and Group Captive Power Plants. India is 3rd largest power producer worldwide.
news.summary: A recent report titled "Growth Opportunities in the Indian Electricity Industry, 2024-2035" has been included in the offerings of ResearchAndMarkets.com. This report examines the progression of the Indian electricity market and offers significant forecasts for the Indian power sector. It emphasizes renewable energy (RE), emerging technologies, and potential investment opportunities in India. India holds the position of being the third-largest electricity producer globally, ranking after China and the United States. The country's electricity sector has been a focal point of growth and development.

news.headline: Drip Water valued at $125 million after $5 million investment from Raya Holding for Middle East expansion.
news.summary: In London on February 4, 2025, Drip Water, a prominent lifestyle water brand in the UK established by British TV personality and musician Big Zuu, has revealed a significant equity investment from Raya Holding. The investment amounts to $5 million and is intended to facilitate the brand's growth in the Middle East region. This move marks a strategic step towards expanding Drip Water's presence in the market.

news.headline: Berry Global Gr (BERY) beat Q1 earnings estimates by 10%, with an EPS of $1.09. Reported on Feb 4, 2025.
news.summary: Berry Global Gr, listed on NYSE as BERY, unveiled its Q1 earnings on Tuesday, February 4, 2025, at 09:15 AM. The company surpassed earnings expectations by 10.0%, with an EPS of $1.09. This information is critical for investors looking to track the stock's performance. For further details, the full story can be accessed on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Cummins Inc's Q4 2024 sales decreased to $8.45B, but saw growth in North America and declines internationally. Operating income dropped to $732M. EPS was $3.02, lower than $4.59 last year. Distribution sales rose by 13%, while Components dropped by 17%. Power Systems increased by 22%. Operating cash for the quarter was $1.4B.
news.summary: Cummins Inc (NYSE:CMI) saw its shares trading higher premarket following the release of its fourth-quarter 2024 results. The company reported a 1% year-over-year sales dip to $8.45 billion, surpassing the $8.07 billion consensus estimate. Sales in North America were steady compared to the previous year, while international revenues fell by 3% in the quarter. Sales figures by segments are as follows: Components at $2.6 billion (-17% Y/Y), Engine at $2.7 billion (-2% Y/Y), Distribution at $3.1 billion (+13% Y/Y), Power Systems at $1.7 billion (+22% Y/Y), and Accelera at $100 million (+23% Y/Y). The EPS for the quarter was $3.02 compared to $4.59 a year ago, missing the consensus loss of $(10.01). Operating income stood at $732 million, down from $1.2 billion in the previous year's quarter. Cummins’ operating cash totaled $1.4 billion for the quarter.

news.headline: Future City® Competition by DiscoverE has inspired middle and high school students for 33 years to innovate for global challenges.
news.summary: In the capital city of Washington on February 4, 2025, the renowned Future City® Competition, hosted by DiscoverE, is underway for its 33rd consecutive year. This event aims to motivate middle and high school students to think innovatively and address worldwide issues through STEM initiatives.

news.headline: HISONG AirStudio One receives CES Innovation Awards® 2025 honor for design and innovation.
news.summary: In Las Vegas on February 4, 2025, the Consumer Technology Association (CTA) announced HISONG AirStudio One as an honoree of the CES Innovation Awards® 2025. This accolade acknowledges the product's outstanding design and technological advancements. The CES Innovation Awards® program recognized HISONG AirStudio One for its innovation in the consumer technology sector.

news.headline: Scenthound emphasizes pet dental care during National Pet Dental Health Month, enhancing dog wellness with education and services.
news.summary: A dog wellness franchise based in Jupiter, Florida, is taking a stand for pet health during National Pet Dental Health Month, which begins on February 4, 2025. Scenthound, the nation's top provider in this industry, is emphasizing the importance of dental hygiene for dogs. Through educational initiatives, services, and cutting-edge products, they are striving to improve the well-being of canines across the country. This initiative aims to raise awareness about maintaining proper dental care for dogs, helping to prevent various health issues.

news.headline: First patient enrolled in Akura Medical's US pivotal trial for pulmonary embolism using Katana™ Thrombectomy System at TriStar Centennial Medical Center. Akura's innovative system removes diverse clot types effectively.
news.summary: A medical milestone was achieved at TriStar Centennial Medical Center with the first successful use of the Katana™ Thrombectomy System. This innovative system, originating from LOS GATOS, Calif., was designed to effectively remove various clot types. It aims to enhance catheter delivery precision and offers real-time feedback during operations. This breakthrough paves the way for advanced thrombectomy procedures, leading to improved patient outcomes.

news.headline: JMIR Publications appoints new CEO Sean Jeong, effective Jan 23, 2025. Dr. Gunther Eysenbach, founder of JMIR.
news.summary: In Toronto on February 4, 2025, JMIR Publications, a prominent open access publisher specializing in digital health and open science, revealed the appointment of Sean Jeong as the new CEO starting from January 23, 2025. Dr. Gunther Eysenbach, the founder of JMIR...

news.headline: Averitt extends PROS subscription for Smart Price Optimization & Management; utilizing since 2014 to refine pricing; boosts revenue.
news.summary: In Houston, PROS Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: PRO), known for AI-driven SaaS pricing and selling solutions, revealed that Averitt, a key figure in freight transportation, has broadened its use of PROS Smart Price Optimization and Management. Averitt has been utilizing PROS tools since 2014 to enhance pricing strategies, ensuring competitive and brand-consistent prices leading to increased revenue.

news.headline: Stryve Foods issues $9.4M of preferred stock to eliminate $8.7M of maturing liabilities, transforming balance sheet.
news.summary: Stryve Foods, Inc. recently announced they have issued $9.4 million in Preferred Stock, significantly boosting their financial standing. This move has also allowed them to revamp their balance sheet by eliminating $8.7 million in maturing liabilities. The company's stock (Nasdaq: SNAX) is expected to be positively impacted by these strategic financial decisions.

news.headline: DGS's Pat Rudolph at #6G Expo will discuss real-time sustainable CBRS spectrum sharing for 6G innovation. 100 characters.
news.summary: Digital Global Systems (DGS), a prominent company specializing in the ongoing detection, identification, classification, and geolocation of radio frequency signals, will have their Senior VP of Marketing, Pat Rudolph, discuss the significance of real-time AI-powered RF awareness in harnessing the capabilities of CBRS shared spectrum. This advancement aims to facilitate increased utilization by enterprises for innovation and growth in the era of 6G. The talk is scheduled to take place from 1:30 to 2:30 pm EST on February 12, 2025, at the #6G EXPO held in conjunction with #IoT Evolution E.
